title: Building A Lot Of Location Pages For Local SEO - Will It Help?
description:
Get my training - https://getbizzyllc.com
My SEO Website Template - https://contractorwebsitetemplate.com
WIX Version - https://israel843.wixsite.com/website-3

Thinking about building a lot of location pages for local SEO? In this video, I explain why this strategy can work, especially for contractors and home service businesses trying to rank on Google. I share how creating multiple location pages targeting smaller towns (the ones most people ignore) can give your business more chances to show up when someone searches for your service nearby. It’s like casting multiple fishing lines—each page is a new opportunity to generate a quality lead through your Google Business Profile.
